categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: Wildfire was a clone trooper unit that was part of the Grand Army of the Republic. During the Clone Wars, its members participated in the raid on Nuvo Vindi's laboratory along with Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, Padawan Ahsoka Tano, Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex," and clone units Calm Tree and Snow Wolves.
